workspaceSettings.description: Configures where to store the OMS agent data for workspaces under a scope

___workspaceId.description: The full Azure ID of the workspace to save the data in

___scope.description: All the VMs in this scope will send their security data to the mentioned workspace unless overridden by a setting with more specific scope

pricings.description: Pricing tier will be applied for the scope based on the resource ID

values.description: Get free Azure security center experience with basic security features
Get the standard Azure security center experience with advanced security features

describes properties of an information protection policy.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___email.description: The email of this security contact

___phone.description: The phone number of this security contact

values.description: Don't get notifications on new alerts

___alertNotifications.description: Whether to send security alerts notifications to the security contact

values.description: Send notification on new alerts to the subscription's admins
Don't send notification on new alerts to the subscription's admins

___alertsToAdmins.description: Whether to send security alerts notifications to subscription admins

describes properties of an auto provisioning setting

Do not install security agent on the VMs automatically
